trans-unit.source: FrameworkElementAdapters is used by [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_wpf](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-wpf-md.md)] add-ins to convert between a <xref href="System.Windows.FrameworkElement"></xref> and an <xref href="System.AddIn.Contract.INativeHandleContract"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: FrameworkElementAdapters används av [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_wpf](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-wpf-md.md)] tillägg för att konvertera mellan en <xref href="System.Windows.FrameworkElement"> </xref> och en <xref href="System.AddIn.Contract.INativeHandleContract"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_wpf](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-wpf-md.md)] extends the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winfx](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] add-in model to allow [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui#plural](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uisharpplural-md.md)] to be passed between host applications and add-ins.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_wpf](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-wpf-md.md)]utökar den [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winfx](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] -modeller att [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui#plural](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uisharpplural-md.md)] som skickas mellan värd-program och tillägg.

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] requires that the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui#plural](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uisharpplural-md.md)] that are passed either directly or indirectly derive from <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement>.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]kräver att den [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui#plural](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uisharpplural-md.md)] som skickas antingen direkt eller indirekt härledd från <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement>.</xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement>

trans-unit.source: However, add-ins and host applications are typically run in separate application domains and are, consequently, separated by an isolation boundary.
trans-unit.target: Dock tillägg och värden program körs vanligtvis i separata programdomäner och, därför åtskilda av en isoleringsgräns.

trans-unit.source: For this reason, the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winfx](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winfx-md.md)] add-in model requires the types that are passed across the isolation boundary to be remotable.
trans-unit.target: Därför kan den [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winfx](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winfx-md.md)] lägga till i modellen kräver de typer som skickas över isoleringsgräns vara fjärranslutningsbar.

trans-unit.source: A remotable type conforms to one of the following: - Implements the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable> interface.
trans-unit.target: En fjärranslutningsbar typ överensstämmer med något av följande:-implementerar den <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable>gränssnitt.</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable>

trans-unit.source: - Has the <xref:System.SerializableAttribute> attribute applied.
trans-unit.target: -Har den <xref:System.SerializableAttribute>-attribut som används.</xref:System.SerializableAttribute>

trans-unit.source: - Derives from the <xref:System.MarshalByRefObject> class.
trans-unit.target: -Härleds från <xref:System.MarshalByRefObject>klassen.</xref:System.MarshalByRefObject>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement> is not remotable and must be converted to a remotable type before it is passed across the isolation boundary between an add-in and a host application.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement>är inte fjärranslutningsbar och måste konverteras till typen fjärranslutningsbar innan den skickas över gränserna isolering mellan ett tillägg och en värdprogrammet.</xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement>

trans-unit.source: For this purpose, you need to call the static <xref:System.AddIn.Pipeline.FrameworkElementAdapters.ViewToContractAdapter%2A> method to convert the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement> to an instance of the remotable <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.INativeHandleContract>.
trans-unit.target: För detta ändamål måste du anropa statisk <xref:System.AddIn.Pipeline.FrameworkElementAdapters.ViewToContractAdapter%2A>metod för att konvertera <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement>till en instans av fjärranslutningsbar <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.INativeHandleContract>.</xref:System.AddIn.Contract.INativeHandleContract> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement> </xref:System.AddIn.Pipeline.FrameworkElementAdapters.ViewToContractAdapter%2A>

trans-unit.source: Once the <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.INativeHandleContract> is passed across the isolation boundary, it must be converted to a type that can be displayed by the host application or the add-in.
trans-unit.target: En gång i <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.INativeHandleContract>skickas över isoleringsgräns, den måste konverteras till en typ som kan visas i programmet eller tillägget</xref:System.AddIn.Contract.INativeHandleContract>

trans-unit.source: In this case, the static <xref:System.AddIn.Pipeline.FrameworkElementAdapters.ContractToViewAdapter%2A> method is called to convert an <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.INativeHandleContract> to a <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement>.
trans-unit.target: I det här fallet den statiska <xref:System.AddIn.Pipeline.FrameworkElementAdapters.ContractToViewAdapter%2A>metoden anropas för att konvertera ett <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.INativeHandleContract>till <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement>.</xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement> </xref:System.AddIn.Contract.INativeHandleContract> </xref:System.AddIn.Pipeline.FrameworkElementAdapters.ContractToViewAdapter%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more detailed exposition of [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] add-ins, see [WPF Add-Ins Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Mer detaljerad verksamhetshandbok för tillverkning av [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] tillägg, se [WPF-tillägg översikt](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: Returns a <xref href="System.Windows.FrameworkElement"></xref> that has been converted from an <xref href="System.AddIn.Contract.INativeHandleContract"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Returnerar en <xref href="System.Windows.FrameworkElement"> </xref> som har konverterats från en <xref href="System.AddIn.Contract.INativeHandleContract"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.AddIn.Contract.INativeHandleContract"></xref> that was passed across the isolation boundary between the host application and the add-in.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.AddIn.Contract.INativeHandleContract"> </xref> som skickades i kolumnrubrikens isolering mellan värdprogrammet och tillägget.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.FrameworkElement"></xref> that will be displayed from either the host application or add-in, depending on the direction in which the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] is passed between the two.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.FrameworkElement"> </xref> som ska visas på värdprogrammet eller -tillägg, beroende på i vilken riktning den [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] överförs mellan två.

trans-unit.source: Returns an <xref href="System.AddIn.Contract.INativeHandleContract"></xref> that has been converted from a <xref href="System.Windows.FrameworkElement"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Returnerar en <xref href="System.AddIn.Contract.INativeHandleContract"> </xref> som har konverterats från en <xref href="System.Windows.FrameworkElement"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.FrameworkElement"></xref> to be passed across the isolation boundary between the host application and the add-in.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Windows.FrameworkElement"> </xref> som ska skickas över gränserna isolering mellan värdprogrammet och tillägget.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.AddIn.Contract.INativeHandleContract"></xref> that is passed from either the host application or the add-in, depending on the direction in which the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] is passed between the two.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.AddIn.Contract.INativeHandleContract"> </xref> som skickas från programmet eller tillägget, beroende på i vilken riktning den [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] överförs mellan två.

trans-unit.source: root is not the root element of a tree of elements.
trans-unit.target: rootär inte rotelement i ett träd med element.
